answers.answer: O.M.G....I'm only 36 weeks and my son current weight is 6lbs 4ozGood luck
I'm 33 weeks today and my son weighs 5 pounds and 3 ounces ! And he's flipped already. Does that mean he will come soon?
Holy crap lol goodluck! Atleast your baby is fully developed and healthy! Congrats to u!

Thanks ladies, the midwifes were all having a laugh about it saying i brew a good baby, whilst i was thinking and worrying about my lady garden lol. Shes head down but not engaged so i thought that meant i would be safe not to go into early labour but aparently not, the consultant has told me with your 2nd child they might not engage until labour and really cause shes at birth weight now she will come when she comes

My daughter was one week early, weighed 8.4lbs and it took two pushes to get her out. My son was 6.7lbs the weeks early, and it was an hour and a half pushing and I tore really badly with him.none with her...
My 33 weeks ultrasound my little girl was weighing 4lbs 7oz. I'll be 35 weeks Monday 01/12. Big baby, maybe you'll go early! Good luck keep us posted!
At 32 weeks my baby was measuring 2 wks and 2 days ahead and 5 lbs.

When I was 33+6 my son measured 5 pounds 12 ounces. I am now 35+2 weeks I go back to the doctor to find out his weight and to see if he's still breeched I hope he's head down cause this is the 2nd time he turned. We are due February 14th but doctor said he might schedule a c section soon

Wednesday baby was 5lbs 3 oz. At 35 weeks I am worried my little girl won't be little. This is my 4th pregnancy and really don't Think baby Will make it to February 18 nor does my doc. Baby is so low which doc say that's normal for 4th time moms. But I worried cuz I don't want baby to be too small. What are you ladies doing to help baby get big. I can eat a lot of things because I have G. DIABETES. Any idea.

I know it seems scary but you can still naturally birth a big baby. My mom had all three of her babies naturally and we all were big fat 10lbs lol, she didn't have gestational diabetes or anything just big babies. Also the scans are not always 100% accurate my technician said they can be off by 8oz
I'm 34 weeks now I found out at 33 weeks my baby was 4 and a half pounds is that a good thing ?

question: Omg i had a scan today im 33 weeks + 4 and my little fatty weighs 6lb 4oz already. All the way through she has been big so i was told by everyone to expect a baby on the big side, but i never thought for 1 moment she would be   this big already, my first was 2 weeks early and weighed 7lb 15oz. Im only 5ft 4 so i defomdont think i will go all the way. Im so scared now for labour is it true that the bigger they arw the easier they are to come out?? Or is it a stupid question.
title: my bany is HUGE!!!!
